fields.text: Thank you for calling Urban Airship in San Francisco, where we orchestrate and deliver hyper-personalized messages in real time.
To discuss campaign orchestration services, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our campaign orchestration team.
To learn about channel integration capabilities, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our channel integration specialists.
For Analytics and reporting support, press [INDEX].
To get real-time campaign data reports, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our analytics reporting team.
To set up a custom dashboard, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our dashboard support specialists.
